summary: This document is an email chain from December 11, 2021, forwarding a defense witness list from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York to FBI personnel in New York. The email requests the FBI to prioritize reaching out to the individuals on the list and to investigate them through Sentinel, as many have previously appeared in the investigation.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney Southern District of New York
persons.context: The sender of the original email attaching the defense witness list and requesting the FBI to investigate the listed individuals.

events.title: Defense Witness List Forwarded to FBI
events.description: An Assistant United States Attorney forwards a defense witness list to FBI personnel, requesting they prioritize contacting and investigating the individuals named, as many have previously come up in the investigation.
personsInvolved: Assistant United States Attorney Southern District of New York

locations: One Saint Andrew's Plaza New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: A defense witness list was forwarded from the US Attorney's Office to the FBI on December 11, 2021.
The FBI was asked to prioritize reaching out to individuals on the defense witness list.
Many individuals on the list had previously come up in the investigation, prompting a request to check them through Sentinel.
The correspondence highlights coordination between the prosecution and law enforcement regarding defense witnesses.
